note.title: Fitness World - Case - Member email unavailable warning
note.content:
LP: Fitness World - Case - Member email unavailable warning

Troubleshooting:

Client Script "u_member_email_unavailable_warning" oprettet men fungerer ikke. Scriptet er oprettet for at imødegå at en Business Rule ikke kan trigger på form/felt-bevægelser dynamisk - som et onChange script kan.

Inaktiveret Business Rule er "u_member_email_unavailable_warning".

Update Set: u_sp_additional_comments_sender_ikke_mails [Customer Service] eller Update Set: u_sp_additional_comments_sender_ikke_mails [Global]

Estimat

getMessage("member_email_unavailable_warning"); skal returnere:

Warning: Member email address unavailable. Current member does not have a valid email address registered thus your communication will not be sent to member. To resolve this, by the Member field click 'Preview this record' > Click 'Open record' > Update 'Email' field > Right-click form header to 'Save' > Click 'Back'-icon. Then re-post communication.

case.consumer hedderMember.

Client script kan også hente messages og oversættelser: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/geneva-servicenow-platform/page/administer/localization/task/t_TranslateAClientScriptMessage.html getMessage(msg)

function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading, isTemplate) {
    if (isLoading || newValue === '') {
        return;
    }
    
    //check for email availability
    if (consumer.email == "") {         
        getMessage("member_email_unavailable_warning");
    }
}

Tilbagemelding til Kim

@KHS Man kan ikke dot-walke i client script. Så når client script u_member_email_unavailable_warning skal teste for if (consumer.email == "") {, kræver dette et GlideAjax opslag til backend. Estimat: 2 timer inkl. test.
